meanings.definition: A rich cake containing dried or candied fruit.
meanings.sent1: My grandma baked a delicious fruitcake for Christmas.
meanings.sent2: I bought a fruitcake from the bakery for dessert.
meanings.sent3: Imagine a fruitcake with pineapple and cherries dancing on top!
meanings.sent4: Her colorful personality was like a fruitcake, full of surprises.
meanings.sent5: The fruitcake was a burst of fruity flavors in my mouth.

meanings.sent1: The man on the corner shouting at pigeons is a real fruitcake.
meanings.sent2: She's a bit of a fruitcake, always coming up with wild ideas.
meanings.sent3: I can't help but laugh at the fruitcake wearing a banana costume.
meanings.sent4: In a world of plain cookies, she was the fruitcake of the group.
meanings.sent5: His antics at the party made him stand out like a fruitcake in a salad.
